ComicInfo.Title: Giant Mousetrap; Astrological Horoscopes; Ballad of the Squeaky Voiced Cowboy; The Dream Came True; Guess the Question; Simulating the Thrills of Big-Time Sports at Home; Ask a Silly Question, Get a...; Cracked Goes to Woodstock; Songs That Never Quite Made It; A Cracked Look at Supermarkets; The Food People; The Ghost and Mrs. Mire
ComicInfo.Summary: British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.Hudd and Dini find a giant mousetrap at the end of their escape tunnel.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:41:30. [Issue ID 250444]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charlie Rodrigues,Vic Martin,John Severin,Bob Taylor,John Langton,Bill Ward,Lugoze
ComicInfo.Inker: Charlie Rodrigues,Vic Martin,John Severin,Bob Taylor,John Langton,Bill Ward,Lugoze
